summary.para: Gets the current list of audio effects for the associated audio stream.

param.name: effects
param.para: Receives a pointer to an array of structures representing the current list of audio effects.

param.name: numEffects
param.para: Receives the number of AUDIO_EFFECT structures returned in effects.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT including but not limited to the following.
| Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success | | AUDCLNT_E_DEVICE_INVALIDATED | The associated audio stream has been destroyed. |

remarks.para: The caller is responsible for freeing the array using .
Register an to receive notifications when the list of audio effects changes.

summary.para: Registers an interface. This callback interface allows applications to receive notifications when the list of audio effects changes or the resources needed to enable an effect changes, i.e. when the value of the canSetState field of the associated changes.

returns.para: | Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success | | AUDCLNT_E_DEVICE_INVALIDATED | The associated audio stream has been destroyed. |

remarks.para: Unregister the callback interface by calling .

summary.para: Sets the state of the specified audio effect.

param.name: effectId
param.para: The GUID identifier of the effect for which the state is being changed. Audio effect GUIDs are defined in ksmedia.h.

param.name: state
param.para: A value from the enumerating specifying the state to set.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT including but not limited to the following.

| Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success | | AUDCLNT_E_EFFECT_NOT_AVAILABLE | The specifed effect is not available | | AUDCLNT_E_EFFECT_STATE_READ_ONLY | The specified effect has a state that is read-only | | AUDCLNT_E_DEVICE_INVALIDATED | The associated audio stream has been destroyed. |

remarks.para: Get the current list of audio effects for the associated audio stream by calling .

returns.para: | Value | Description | |-------|-------------| | S_OK | Success | | AUDCLNT_E_DEVICE_INVALIDATED | The associated audio stream has been destroyed. |

remarks.para: Register the callback interface by calling .

summary.para: Provides management functionality for the audio effects pipeline for the associated audio stream, allowing applications to get the current list of effects, set the state of effects, and to register for notifications when the list of effects or effect states change.

remarks.para: Get an instance of this interface by calling passing in the interface pointer of the IAudioEffectsManager interface.
